ComicInfo.Summary:
With his home planet possibly destroyed, has Grendel Prime discovered a new home for humanitys rebirth--or has he found an icy, permanent tomb for himself and Sigma-7? Far in space, an intelligent alien race holds a startling secret that Prime is about to uncover!
Variant cover by Tyler Crook!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Matt Wagner (a) & Brennan Wagner (c) | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Tyler Crook (a) & Brennan Wagner (c) | 2 |
